entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 16.
